typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as timestamp,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(UserID != 'Null' && toString({VisitDateTime})>= toString('2018-05-07') && toString({VisitDateTime})<= toString('2018-05-27')) ~> Filterdata
Filterdata select(mapColumn(
		webClientID,
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID,
		Activity,
		Browser,
		OS,
		City,
		Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finaldata
finaldata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['processed_log'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		webClientID,
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID,
		Activity,
		Browser,
		OS,
		City,
		Country
	)) ~> finalprocessed
